project.description: The purpose of this job is to start a boot server instance on a particular machine. This job is meant to be started via a rest call with certain commandline arguments

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
############################################################################### # You might want or need to change these ############################################################################### LOGFILE="./log/$(date -u +%y%m%d_%H%M).log" MVN_CMD="mvn" #COMP_CMD="7za a -mx=9" COMP_EXT="7z" #COMP_CMD="tar -cjvf" #COMP_EXT="bz2" #COMP_CMD="zip -9" #COMP_EXT="9.zip" #COMP_CMD="zip" #COMP_EXT="zip" COMP_CMD="tar -czvf" COMP_EXT="tar.gz"
interfacePath="faces/serverInterface.jsp" pomPath="faces/download" LOGFILE="./log/boot.$(date -u +%y%m%d_%H%M).log"
############################################################################### # No need to change anything below this line ###############################################################################
function log () { if [ "$1" == 'nl' ]; then echo -e "\n$2" | tee -a $LOGFILE else echo -e "$1" | tee -a $LOGFILE fi }
function cleanup () { # TODO Enable below #log nl "Cleaning up" #rm -fr ./log/init* #rm -fr ./log/powertac* #rm -fr ./game* #rm -f ./pom.xml
log nl "Not cleaning up, need to enable this" }
function get_pom () { wget -O pom.xml $pomUrl SIZE=$(stat -c%s "pom.xml") if [ $SIZE -le 10 ] ; then log nl "Error getting pom : $pomUrl" log nl "Notify TS we're boot_failed" wget --spider -q "$interfaceUrl?action=status&gameId=$gameId&status=boot_failed" cleanup exit 1 else log "Pom retrieved" fi }
############################################################################### # Here we go! ###############################################################################
# Some intermediate variables interfaceUrl="$tourneyUrl$interfacePath" pomUrl="$tourneyUrl$pomPath?pomId=$pomId" bootName="game-$gameId-boot" suffix="boot-"
# Make sure logdir exists DIRECTORY="log" if [ ! -d "$DIRECTORY" ]; then mkdir $DIRECTORY fi
log "" StartTime=$(date +%s) log "StartTime : $(date -u +%F\ %H:%M:%S)" log "Nodename : $NODE_NAME" log "BuildNumber : $BUILD_NUMBER" log "Account : ${USER}" log "GameId : $gameId" log "PomId : $pomId" log "TourneyUrl : $tourneyUrl" log "MVN_CMD : $MVN_CMD" log "COMP_CMD : $COMP_CMD" log "COMP_EXT : $COMP_EXT" log "interfacePath : $interfacePath" log "interfaceUrl : $interfaceUrl" log "pomPath : $pomPath" log "pomUrl : $pomUrl" log "bootName : $bootName"
log nl "Get the pom file from $pomUrl" get_pom
CMD="$MVN_CMD -U -Pcli -Dexec.args=\"--boot $bootName.xml --game-id $gameId --control $tourneyUrl --log-suffix $suffix$gameId\"" log nl "Run maven : $CMD \n" eval $CMD
log nl "Bootstrap complete!"
if [ -e "$bootName.xml" ] ; then FILESIZE=$(stat -c%s "$bootName.xml") else FILESIZE=0 fi
if [ "$FILESIZE" -eq 0 ] ; then cleanup
log nl "Notify TS we're boot_failed" wget --spider -q "$interfaceUrl?action=status&gameId=$gameId&status=boot_failed"
exit 1 else EndTime=$(date +%s) ((RunningTime=EndTime-StartTime)) log nl "Bootstrap took (M:S) $(($RunningTime / 60)):$(($RunningTime % 60))"
log nl "Compressing log files" $COMP_CMD "$bootName-logs.$COMP_EXT" log/powertac-$suffix$gameId.* log/init.*
log nl "Sending log file" curl --upload-file "$bootName-logs.$COMP_EXT" "$interfaceUrl?fileName=$bootName-logs.$COMP_EXT"
log nl "Sending boot file" curl --upload-file "$bootName.xml" "$interfaceUrl?fileName=$bootName.xml"
cleanup
log nl "Notify TS we're boot_complete" wget --spider -q "$interfaceUrl?action=status&gameId=$gameId&status=boot_complete" fi
exit 0
